thread.title: 'He could have gone anywhere,' Comerica Park visitor says of always Detroiter Mike Ilitch
thread.title_full: 'He could have gone anywhere,' Comerica Park visitor says of always Detroiter Mike Ilitch

author: Danielle Salisbury | Danielle_Salisbury@mlive.com
title: 'He could have gone anywhere,' Comerica Park visitor says of always Detroiter Mike Ilitch
text: She was standing Saturday near the tiger statute outside Comerica Park and shared her memories of the Detroit Red Wings and Tigers owner, the founder of Little Caesar's Pizza.
